meanings.sent1: She backgrounded the small details in the painting to make the main subject stand out.
meanings.sent2: The photographer backgrounded the mountains to highlight the sunset.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor accidentally backgrounded the prop that was supposed to be center stage.
meanings.sent4: In the meeting, her voice was backgrounded by the loud discussion happening nearby.
meanings.sent5: The soft music backgrounded the romantic dinner perfectly.

meanings.sent1: He backgrounded the presentation slides with colorful images to make them more engaging.
meanings.sent2: The artist backgrounded the portrait with a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent3: The teacher backgrounded the lesson with interesting historical facts.
meanings.sent4: Her story was backgrounded by the sounds of nature around her.
meanings.sent5: The movie backgrounded the action scenes with emotional music.

meanings.sent1: The manager backgrounded the less experienced employees during the important client meeting.
meanings.sent2: She backgrounded her personal issues to focus on her work.
meanings.sent3: The chef backgrounded the dessert to prioritize preparing the main course.
meanings.sent4: His excitement backgrounded his worries about the upcoming exam.
meanings.sent5: The team backgrounded individual achievements to celebrate their collective success.
